attributes.action: prevent environmental harm to the Somerset Levels, Allerton Moors and the Mendips by the erection of a major electrical power infrastructure (46 m  pylons) running from Hinkley C to Seabank at Avonmouth, Bristol (Route 2)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This proposal affects areas ajacent to an AONB and traverse an area of Somerset that is renowned for its wildlife and natural beauty.  It will scythe through many pleasant villages.  The proposed route is in a flood plain and would leave numerous properties subject to enhanced risk of flooding.
